UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mutational analysis of the role of tryptophan residues in an antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Fimland G, Eijsink VG, Nissen-Meyer J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Latilactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714(MIC50=0.2µM),Loigolactobacillus coryniformis subsp. torquens NCDO 2740(MIC50=0.4µM),Carnobacterium maltaromaticum UI49(MIC50=0.1µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCDO 581(MIC50=0.25µM)
